scripts.test: mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register test/*.js && eslint lib test
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean copy -p build:js build:css -s build:html
scripts.build:js: browserify -d -t [babelify --presets es2015] -o build/main.js src/main.js && uglifyjs --screw-ie8 --mangle < build/main.js > build/main.min.js
scripts.build:css: stylus --sourcemap-inline styles/main.styl -u autoprefixer-stylus -o build/main.css && cssmin build/main.css > build/main.min.css
scripts.build:html: cp src/index.html build/sourcemapped.html && sed 's,main.\(js\|css\),main.min.\1,g' < src/index.html | html-inline --ignore-scripts -o build/index.html -b build/
